title: Frozen Client
body: At the time I was about to get on to a new ranged game , just then the client becomes unresponsive but when it got fixed the team remake making me lose rp even though I didn't leave or afk its the clients fault for making me lose rp and missing out on a ranked game,this happened twice today.{{sticker:slayer-jinx-unamused}}

replies.body:
This is typically caused by your connection to the servers becoming unstable and is often exacerbated by network settings that conflict with League. Check out our [Connection Guide](https://support.riotgames.com/hc/en-us/articles/201752664-Troubleshooting-Connection-Issues) for some steps that should assist in resolving this. 

Let me know if you continue to see these issues.

Hey, targons! Something very similar happened to me just now. While loading I got a message saying "Network connection has become unavalible. Please try again." It said that every time I mashed reconnect, but everything else worked fine. I'm only play on a hardwired connect, and checked my packet loss to verify there wasn't an issue on my end. I restarted my computer and got back in just in time to connect to the after game lobby when everyone was cursing at me for wasting their time xD. I know you guys will not return lp/MMR but don't ya think branding my match history with LEAVER is a bit demeaning?
